item.title: Delete
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]That was a bit more easier to understand.

Post your ShopAssistant class on PasteBin.[/quote]

You need something like this in your ShopAssistant

		public void handleOtherShop(int itemID) {
			int Slot2 = 0;//Pking Points
			Slot2 = c.pkPoints;
			if (c.myShopId == PKSHOPNUMBER && Slot2 >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
					if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
						c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
						c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
						c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Pk Points.");
				}
			}
		}

Read full topic
